text: Fenugreek is a plant in the family Fabaceae. Fenugreek is often used as a herb (the leaves) and spice (the seeds, also called methi). == Medicinal uses == Fenugreek said to stop the uncomfortable feeling of arthritis.Radio ABC Melbourne Victoria Australia Morning Programme 24 Mar 2011 == References == Category:Faboideae
title: Fenugreek
